message: Let's split it evenly, it's fair!
You said it's fair, but I think I deserve a bit more!
I'll give you a bit more, but don't think you're getting too greedy!
You think I'm greedy, but I'm just trying to get my fair share!
I'll meet you in the middle, but don't expect me to give in too much!
I'm starting to think you're not serious about dividing it fairly...
